title: PODCASTS
description: Hosted on Audible & Spotify, Manas keeps you good and positive company with his stories, anecdotes and life changing experiences. Tune into your genius.

episodes.title: Episode 1: The Power of Mindset
episodes.description: Exploring how mindset shapes our success and daily life

episodes.title: Episode 2: Leadership in Crisis
episodes.description: How to lead effectively during challenging times

episodes.title: Episode 3: Building Resilience
episodes.description: Strategies for developing mental and emotional resilience
